title: Sugar-Free Sugar Cookies with Sugar-Free Sugar Icing

Ingredients.3: 0.25 cup Pyure Organic All Purpose Stevia Blend

Ingredients.11: 3 tablespoons Pyure Organic All Purpose Stevia Blend

Directions.1: Beat butter with Pyure Organic All Purpose Stevia Blend until light and fluffy.

Directions.2: Beat in egg until well blended. Beat in vanilla.

Directions.3: Whisk flour, baking powder and salt together. Stir into butter mixture in two additions.

Directions.4: Wrap dough in plastic wrap and refrigerate for 30 minutes.

Directions.5: Roll on lightly floured surface or between sheets of waxed paper to 1/4-inch thick.

Directions.6: Using desired cookie cutter, cut out desired shapes.

Directions.7: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Place cookies 2-inches apart on parchment paper lined baking sheets. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until golden. Let cool on racks.

Directions.8: Glaze cookies with Pyure Sugar Free Cookie Icing.

Directions.9: Icing Directions: Beat cornstarch, Pyure Organic All Purpose Stevia Blend and butter with a mixer on medium-high speed until well combined.

Directions.10: Gradually add milk and vanilla until smooth. Add more milk if icing mixture is too dry.

Directions.11: If adding food coloring, add a drop at a time until desired color is reached.

Directions.12: Refrigerate icing for 10 minutes until set.

Directions.13: Spread or pipe over cooled Sugar Free Sugar Cookies. Use day of.
